original_text: Then the master will punish him a lot. He will put the servant with those people who do not obey him. The people in that place will cry and they will bite their teeth together.’
korean_text: 엄히 때리고 외식하는 자가 받는 벌에 처하리니 거기서 슬피 울며 이를 갈리라

sentences.original_text: Then the master will punish him a lot.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주인은 그를 크게 벌할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will put the servant with those people who do not obey him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 종을 자신에게 순종하지 않는 사람들과 함께 둘 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The people in that place will cry
and they will bite their teeth together.'
